title: Surmount: A Mountain Climbing Adventure
description:
Surmount is a free-flowing, physics-based platforming adventure where you’ll experience the joys of mountain climbing. Make your perilous ascent through the various handcrafted and procedurally generated challenges of Mount Om, all the while following a silly story with eccentric folks along the way. Master your own unique style of climbing either alone or with a friend, upgrade and customize your climber to stand a better chance, and maybe just maybe, you’ll be the first ever to reach the top. Farm Together 2
Be the first to reach the top of Mount Om, the highest mountain in the world. Discover an endless amount of unique climbing routes along the way. An approachable physics-based climbing system that is endlessly replayable and not overly punishing . On your way to the top of Mount Om, you’ll meet a variety of eccentric characters. All with their own reasons to journey to the top.
